name: GENERAL ELECTRIC CO
footnote: Our consolidated assets at December 31, 2018 included total assets of $5,475 million of certain variable interest entities (VIEs) that can only be used to settle the liabilities of those VIEs. These assets included current receivables and net financing receivables of $3,158 million and investment securities of $35 million within continuing operations and assets of discontinued operations of $133 million.
